links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Kathryn Hurlbutt''' (born [[1958]]) is a British actress. After winning the Carleton Hobbs Bursary Award in [[1980]], she became part of the [[BBC]]'s stock actors of radio drama. She voiced [[Rose Cotton]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|the 1981 radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
